knimeNode.name: Alpha Miner
knimeNode.shortDescription: This node applies the Alpha Miner on an event log

fullDescription.intro: This node applies the Alpha Miner on an event log. It discovers a Petri net as output.
fullDescription.option: The event classifier to classify the event log. The event log classifiers from event log and event attributes can be used as classifier.
The Alpha miner variant to discover a Petri net from the event log. Currently, it has two version, one is Alpha Miner Classic, one is AlphaMiner Plus.
